# Welcome
Welcome to workshop website.

## Introduction
The workshop will be held on the 28th of June in Maastricht.

### Timetable
The day will consist of presentations, hands-on sessions and discussions. We will cover:

| Time  | Topic                     | Speaker(s)                              | Description                                                                                  | Slides & Materials                                                                                  |
|-------|---------------------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 8:30  | Introduction              | Vivian Weerdesteyn                     | Intro to mobile brain imaging and its potential.                                             | [Slides](slides/vivian_intro.pdf)                                                                  |
| 8:35  | Multimodal setups         | Sue Peters, Vaishali Vinod              | Overview of EEG and fNIRS data synchronization with LSL.                                     | [Slides fNIRS](slides/sue_multimodal_fnirs_plus_wrapup.pdf.pdf) <br> [Slides EEG](slides/lila_sync_eeg.pdf) |
| 9:10  | Data collection           | Everyone supported by [mbt](https://mbraintrain.com/) and [NIRX](https://nirx.net/) | Hands-on mobile fNIRS or EEG data collection in combination with other modalities.           |                                                                                                     |
| 10:10 | Break                     |                                         |                                                                                              |                                                                                                     |
| 10:30 | Data (pre-)processing     | Konstantinos Tsikrikis, Joris van der Cruijsen, Tjeerd Boonstra | Example data (pre-)processing.                                                              | [Slides EEG 1](slides/joris_eeg_preprocessing.pdf) <br> [Slides EEG 2](slides/tjeerd_gait_related_eeg_processing_2.pdf) |
| 11:30 | Wrap-up                   | Sue Peters, Natalie Richer              | Pitfalls, practical considerations, and potential study designs.                             | [Slides](slides/sue_multimodal_fnirs_plus_wrapup.pdf)                                               |


All slides and materials will be made avaliable online after the meeting.

## Location
The workshop will be take place at room 0.8Rome at the MECC Maastricht, Forum 100, 6229 GV Maastricht, Netherlands.
